description:
When one falls, we continue.
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a turn-based "j'RPG" with real-time dodging/parrying and tons of build variety,
the debut game from French studio Sandfall Interactive.
For those who come after.

v0.1.description:
The first workable version of Clair Obscur : Expedition 33 apworld ! Jostar, Yezzdia and me are very happy to released it !
We assumed that you have already played the game when you are reading this. If not and do not to be spoil, i recommend to not read further.

### **Current locations**
- Item on floor 
- Bosses (including mimes and chromatic)

### **The items**
- Pictos & Weapons. Their level is a setting (by sphere placement, by the order of received, balanced random or full random)
- Esquie's abilities
- Area tickets (Can't go to the area if you don't have the corresponding tickets)
- Lost gestrals
- Some quests items
- Characters

### **Options**
- Goals (Paintress, Curator, Painted Love, Simon)
- Character Shuffle
- Free aim (in exploration mode) shuffle
- Exclude endgame 
- Exclude Endless tower
- Gestral shuffle
- Starting char (if char shuffle is enabled)
- Gear scaling
- Area logic


If you are on the AP dark server, there is the channel: https://discord.com/channels/1085716850370957462/1371907053626593301
Ping @Demorck to report a bug !

v0.1.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Update location to include condition by @yezzdia in https://github.com/Demorck/ClairObscur_APWorld/pull/30
* Trap chance/deathlink added to options, some small fixes by @JJostar in https://github.com/Demorck/ClairObscur_APWorld/pull/31



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Demorck/ClairObscur_APWorld/compare/v0.1...v0.1.1

v0.1.4.title: v0.1.4

v0.1.8.description:
- New goal option: Clea
- Max Gear Level option. Pictos and weapons will only scale up to match your goal, so there's less chance of getting obscenely overpowered gear from sphere_placement out-of-logic locations, or from balanced_random. Or set it to whatever you want, go nuts
sphere_placement gear scaling option fixed in multiworlds with more than one Clair Obscur slot. No more being obscenely underpowered
- Chroma Elixir shards increased
- Upgrade materials in the pool slightly rebalanced
- Various location name fixes
- The Chosen Path softlock fixed
Worlds generated with this version will require client version 0.1.8 or above.
v0.1.8.title: v0.1.8

v0.2.0.description:
- Added locations from Verso's Draft
- Added 4 Superbosses in locations
